General.Name: XiAn Catering Co Ltd
General.Description: Xi'an Catering Co., Ltd. operates and manages restaurants and hotels. The company operates a chain of restaurants, hotels, dumpling restaurants, and roast duck restaurants. It is also involved in the hotel management, property management, catering management, business information service, tourism and catering culture, brand operation management, educate, food processing, consultation, and supply chain management services, as well as provides catering and food delivery services. Xi'an Catering Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Xi'an, China.

5.Name: Mr. Guo  Yangqun
5.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
